channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟠 12:32 Attention! Dronov-Kamikadze attack lasts
item.description: 🟠 12:32 Attention! Dronov-Kamikadze attack lasts This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 12:25 Air alarm to Kharkiv Oblast Watch Further Messages.
